title: PICS: Biker stops ex on the way to her wedding
text:
"He lost his opportunity when he was with her, now let her marry in peace."

A biker pulled up next to his ex-girlfriend’s wedding car in a bid to stop her from marrying the man she loves.

The bizarre incident took place in the city of Medellin in Columbia after the unnamed biker stopped his motorcycle in front of his ex-girlfriend’s wedding car.

In the now-viral video, the biker, still wearing his helmet, can be seen speaking to the bride-to-be, who was wearing a breathtaking gown, as she sits in the antique car.

The unnamed man fell to his knees and reportedly begged her not to get married and even tried kissing her at one point, prompting her to shove him away.

Onlookers can be heard saying, “Don’t get married”, while others shouted, “Kiss, kiss!”

But local media reports the bride left the scene in the car while the biker stayed behind alone on his two-wheeler.

“He lost his opportunity when he was with her, now let her marry in peace,” one Netizen commented.

“What a humiliating situation. Ridiculous. Nobody is forcing anybody to marry. Whoever is getting married does it because they want to. It’s nothing about confusion. Everybody is responsible for their choices in life. The woman decided to get married, and this guy is humiliating a woman who doesn’t love him anymore,” another person wrote.
description: "He lost his opportunity when he was with her, now let her marry in peace."
